text: "Sin rencor" (, "Without grudge") is a song composed and recorded by Spanish singer Marcos Llunas. It is best known as the Spanish entry at the Eurovision Song Contest 1997, in Dublin. ==Eurovision== The song was performed tenth in the contest, following Italy's Jalisse with "Fiumi di parole" and preceding Germany's Bianca Shomburg with "Zeit". The song received 96 points, placing 6th in a field of 25. The song was succeeded as the Spanish entry at the 1998 contest by Mikel Herzog with "¿Qué voy a hacer sin ti?". ==References== Category:Eurovision songs of Spain Category:Eurovision songs of 1997 Category:1997 songs
title: Sin rencor
